Ragnar sidestepped and avoided the knife, but Riekan fell down hard on 
him.

Ragnar muttered: Honorless fools...

He fired his autocannon on the bot right on top of him.

Katya jerked backward as the metal foot caught her. She regained 
enough to fire her large laser.

Blackfang took his shotgun and aimed. He fired four blasts at the 
pumpkin abomination. But then, he realized that it bore the Maximal 
insignia and a unit designation he seemed to remember.

Blackfang: Shit! You're a member of the Maximal Iron Squad!
